This site contains the code and results for the analysis of IMPG1 and IMPG2 expression at the single-cell level in the retina of human, mouse, and macaque, as part of Williams _et al_ 2022 (_manuscript in preparation_)

All the code and results of this analysis are available from GitHub at https://github.com/jeremymsimon/Williams_Retina_scRNA_IMPG2.
